trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Marble Falls
There were no other sightings in Marble Falls on or around June 3rd 2011
divs: Sighting Detailson june 3 2011 me and my wife were driving home from visiting family in bertram texas on hwy 281 when on the right side of the highway flying just below the tops of the hills we both saw from about 2 miles away a cigar shaped object flying from left to right.upon seeing the object it was obvious that it was not an aircraft from here so i diciede to speed up to get a closer look i did so with out losing sight of the craft but when he had gone about a quarter of a mile it just dissappered.unfourtantley i can not be sure of the exact time.the craft did not scare or freighten me or my wife in any way
